text: Can you cancel my appointment on April 10th with Dr. Davis under the name David Brown? The appointment ID is 56789012.
Your appointment on April 10th with Dr. Davis under the name David Brown has been successfully cancelled. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
Yes, I need to record my health data.
Alright, please provide your user ID, time and health data.
My user ID is 123456, the time is 2023-04-12 10:30:00, and the health data is [{'name': 'blood_pressure', 'value': '130/90'}, {'name': 'heart_rate', 'value': '75'}].
Alright, I have recorded your health data.
Is there anything else I can assist you with?
